"Lens Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, Focus-area Selection Center, Face Detection, Frame Coverage Shooting Mode: 97% Horizontal and 97% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Frame Coverage Playback Mode: 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Shooting Modes: Point and...View More
"Lens Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, Focus-area Selection Center, Face Detection, Frame Coverage Shooting Mode: 97% Horizontal and 97% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Frame Coverage Playback Mode: 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Shooting Modes: Point and Shoot, Choose a Style (Shoot Close-ups, Photograph Food, Shoot at Intervals, Shoot Under Water, Take Series of Pictures, Photograph Fireworks, Mirror, Take Soft Pictures, Create Diorama Effect, Take Series of Pictures: Four Images at Rate of About 1.5 fps, Exposure Control Programmed Auto Exposure and Exposure Compensation: -2.0 - .0 EV in increments of 1 EV, Shutter: Mechanical and Charge-coupled Electronic Shutter, Aperture Electronically-controlled ND Filter (-3 AV) Selection, Range 2 Steps (f/3.3 and f/9.3 [W]), Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes, Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, 1/4 inch Tripod Socket, Operating Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Humidity: 85%, Waterproof, Dustproof, Shockproof, Fun Filters, Motion Blur Reduction, Easy to Handle, One Button-one Function, Crisp 720p Video Recording, Automatic Power-off"
